<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:2pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p>
<p style="border-bottom:Double 2.25pt;padding-bottom:1pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:2pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">\</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:4pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:18pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">UNITED STATES </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:18pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">WASHINGTON, D.C. 20549  </p>
<p style="text-align:center;border-bottom:Solid 1pt;padding-bottom:1pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:40%;margin-right:40%;text-indent:0%;font-size:6pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:18pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">FORM <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000000" name="dei:DocumentType" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231">10-Q</ix:nonNumeric> </p>

</table></div>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">for the transition period from <span style="text-decoration:underline;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</span> to <span style="text-decoration:underline;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>. </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Commission File Number: <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000015" name="dei:EntityFileNumber" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231">0-16195</ix:nonNumeric> </p>
<p style="text-align:center;border-bottom:Solid 1pt;padding-bottom:1pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:40%;margin-right:40%;text-indent:0%;font-size:6pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p>

<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;" id="Part_1"><span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">PART I</span><span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> - FINANCIAL INFORMATION</span></p>
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:10.27%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Item&#160;1.</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;" id="ITEM_1_FINANCIAL_STATEMENTS">FINANCIAL STATEMENTS </p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:10.27%;text-indent:-10.27%;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">II-VI Incorporated and Subsidiaries</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:10.27%;text-indent:-10.27%;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;" id="CondensedConsolidatedBalanceSheets">Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheets (Unaudited)</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:10.27%;text-indent:-10.27%;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">($000)</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:10.27%;text-indent:-10.27%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&#160;</p>
<div>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin:auto;border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:66.3%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1.86%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:13.96%;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">December 31,</p></td>

</table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">- See notes to condensed consolidated financial statements. </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">7</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">e&#160;<span style="font-size:10pt;">II-VI Incorporated and Subsidiaries </span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;" id="Condensed_Consolidated_Statement_Share">Condensed Consolidated Statements of Shareholders&#8217; Equity (Unaudited) </p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">- See notes to condensed consolidated financial statements. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">8</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">II-VI Incorporated and Subsidiaries </span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;" id="Notes">Notes to Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements (Unaudited) </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:6pt;">&#160;</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000375" name="us-gaap:OrganizationConsolidationAndPresentationOfFinancialStatementsDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:10.27%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note&#160;1.</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">Basis of Presentation </p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The condensed consolidated financial statements of II-VI Incorporated (&#8220;II-VI&#8221;, the &#8220;Company&#8221;, &#8220;we&#8221;, &#8220;us&#8221; or &#8220;our&#8221;) for the three and six months ended December 31, 2019 and 2018 are unaudited. In the opinion of management, all adjustments considered necessary for a fair presentation for the periods presented have been included. All adjustments are of a normal recurring nature unless disclosed otherwise. Certain information and footnote disclosures normally included in financial statements prepared in accordance with accounting principles generally accepted in the United States of America (&#8220;U.S. GAAP&#8221;) have been condensed or omitted. These condensed consolidated financial statements should be read in conjunction with the audited consolidated financial statements and notes thereto included in the Company&#8217;s Annual Report on Form 10-K dated August 16, 2019. The consolidated results of operations for the three and six months ended December 31, 2019 are not necessarily indicative of the results to be expected for the full fiscal year. The Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheet information as of June 30, 2019 was derived from the Company&#8217;s audited consolidated financial statements.</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Effective July 1, 2019, the Company has realigned its organizational structure into two reporting segments for the purpose of making operational decisions and assessing financial performance: (i) Compound Semiconductors and (ii) Photonic Solutions. </p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On September 24, 2019, the Company completed the acquisition of Finisar Corporation (&#8220;Finisar&#8221;). The Company&#8217;s condensed consolidated financial statements include the operating results of Finisar from the date of acquisition. Refer to Note 3 for further discussion of the acquisition. </p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000376" name="us-gaap:NewAccountingPronouncementsAndChangesInAccountingPrinciplesTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000376_dcnt_ab19cb5e-0fbb-46fb-a7ca-43d523dfe362">
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:10.27%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:9pt;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note&#160;2.</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:9pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">Recently Issued Financial Accounting Standards </p></td></tr></table></div><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000392" name="us-gaap:NewAccountingPronouncementsPolicyPolicyTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000392_dcnt_41b09948-fe10-43d0-81b7-509e8e39a0f5">
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Leases</p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In February 2016, the Financial Accounting Standards Board (&#8220;FASB&#8221;) issued ASU 2016-02, Leases (Topic 842). This ASU modifies lease accounting for lessees to increase transparency and comparability by recording lease assets and liabilities for operating leases and disclosing key information about leasing arrangements. The Company adopted this standard on July 1, 2019.&#160;&#160;The Company has elected to utilize the optional transition method.  See Note 5.</p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Derivatives and Hedging</p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In August 2017, the FASB issued ASU 2017-12, Derivatives and Hedging (Topic 815): Targeted Improvements to Accounting for Hedging Activities (&#8220;ASU 2017-12&#8221;), which more closely aligns an entity&#8217;s risk management activities and financial reporting for hedging relationships through changes to both the designation and measurement guidance for qualifying hedging relationships and the presentation of hedge results.&#160;&#160;The Company adopted this standard on July 1, 2019.&#160;&#160;The adoption of this standard did not have a material effect on the consolidated financial statements.</p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Pronouncements Currently Under Evaluation </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In July 2016, the FASB issued ASU No. 2016-13, Financial Instruments &#8211; Credit Losses (Topic 326): Measurement of Credit Losses on Financial Instruments (&#8220;ASU 2016-13&#8221;), which among other things, requires the measurement of all expected credit losses of financial assets held at the reporting date based on historical experience, current conditions, and reasonable and supportable forecasts. Financial institutions and other organizations will now use forward looking information to better inform their credit loss estimates. In addition, the ASU amends the accounting for credit losses on available-for-sale debt securities and purchased financial assets with credit deterioration. ASU 2016-13 is effective for annual periods beginning after December 15, 2019, and interim periods within those fiscal years. The Company is in the process of evaluating the impact of the pronouncement.</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In October 2018, the FASB issued ASU 2018-16, Derivatives and Hedging (Topic 815): Inclusion of the Secured Overnight Financing Rate (SOFR) Overnight Index Swap (OIS) Rate as a Benchmark Interest Rate for Hedge Accounting Purposes (&#8220;ASU 2018-16&#8221;), which permits the use of the OIS rate based on SOFR as a U.S. benchmark interest rate eligible for hedge accounting purposes.&#160;&#160;For public business entities that already have adopted the amendments in ASU 2017-12, the amendments in ASU 2018-16 are effective for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2019, and interim periods within those fiscal years.&#160;&#160;Early adoption is permitted in any interim period upon issuance of this update if an entity already has adopted ASU 2017-12.&#160;&#160;The Company is in the process of evaluating the impact of the pronouncement.</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">9</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:continuation id="F_000376_dcnt_ab19cb5e-0fbb-46fb-a7ca-43d523dfe362"><ix:continuation id="F_000392_dcnt_41b09948-fe10-43d0-81b7-509e8e39a0f5">
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation></ix:continuation><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000377" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000377_dcnt_68423575-ce1b-4d85-a542-f9cc2cb94830">
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:10.27%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-top:9pt;margin-bottom:0pt;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 3.</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-top:9pt;margin-bottom:0pt;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">Finisar Acquisition </p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On September 24, 2019 (the &#8220;Closing Date&#8221;), the Company completed its acquisition of Finisar, a global technology leader for subsystems and components for fiber optic communications. </p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Pursuant to the terms of the Agreement and Plan of Merger, dated as of November&#160;8, 2018 (the &#8220;Merger Agreement&#8221;), Mutation Merger Sub Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company (&#8220;Merger Sub&#8221;), merged with and into Finisar (the &#8220;Merger&#8221;), with Finisar surviving the Merger. Each issued and outstanding share of Finisar&#8217;s common stock was automatically cancelled and converted into the right to receive the following consideration (collectively the &#8220;Merger Consideration&#8221;), at the election of the holder of the share of Finisar&#8217;s common stock:</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:9.17%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:2pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:3.33%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:2pt;font-size:10pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8226;</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">

<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company recorded $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000430" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationAcquisitionRelatedCosts" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20191001_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">8.0</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000431" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationAcquisitionRelatedCosts" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">40.2</ix:nonFraction> million of acquisition related costs in the three and six months ended December 31, 2019, respectively, representing professional and other direct acquisition costs. These costs are recorded within selling, general, and administrative expense in our Condensed Consolidated Statement of Earnings (Loss). </p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On the Closing Date, the Company entered into an Amended and Restated Credit Agreement, dated as of September 24, 2019 (the &#8220;New Credit Agreement&#8221;), by and among the Company, Bank of America, N.A., as Administrative Agent, Swing Line Lender and an L/C Issuer, and the other lender parties thereto. Refer to Note 10 for additional information on the new credit facility.&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">From the Closing Date, Finisar contributed $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000432" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationRevenueOfAcquireeSinceAcquisitionDateActual" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20191001_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">306.6</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000433" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationRevenueOfAcquireeSinceAcquisitionDateActual" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">328.7</ix:nonFraction> million of our consolidated revenue for the three and six months ended December 31, 2019, respectively. Including severance related costs, Finisar&#8217;s contribution to our net loss was a loss of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000434" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationEarningsOrLossOfAcquireeSinceAcquisitionDateActual" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20191001_20191231" decimals="-5" sign="-" scale="6">7.3</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000435" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationEarningsOrLossOfAcquireeSinceAcquisitionDateActual" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="-5" sign="-" scale="6">22.7</ix:nonFraction> million during the three and six months ended December 31, 2019, respectively. </p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000394" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfRecognizedIdentifiedAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000394_cnt_1">
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company allocated the fair value of the purchase price consideration to the tangible assets, liabilities, and intangible assets acquired, generally based on estimated fair values. The excess purchase price over those fair values is recorded as goodwill. Our valuation assumptions of acquired assets and assumed liabilities require significant estimates, especially with respect to intangible assets. Our preliminary allocation of the purchase price of Finisar, based on the estimated fair value of the assets acquired and liabilities assumed as of the Closing Date, is as follows (in $000):</p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric>

<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The purchase price allocation set forth herein is preliminary and will be revised as additional information becomes available during the measurement period, which could be up to 12 months from the Closing Date. Any such revisions or changes may be material. The Company utilized market available benchmarking analysis to perform the preliminary allocation above.</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">As of December 31, 2019, the goodwill and intangibles have been allocated to the Photonic Solutions and Compound Semiconductors segments. The preliminary goodwill of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000449" name="us-gaap:Goodwill" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20181108" decimals="-5" scale="6">774.1</ix:nonFraction> million arising from the acquisition is attributed to the expected synergies, including future cost savings, and other benefits expected to be generated by combining II-VI and Finisar. Substantially all of the goodwill recognized is not expected to be deductible for tax purposes. See Note 9 for additional information on goodwill and intangibles. </p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Supplemental Pro Forma Information</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The supplemental pro forma financial information presented below is for illustrative purposes only and is not necessarily indicative of the financial position or results of operations that would have been realized if the acquisition had been completed on the date indicated, does not reflect synergies that might have been achieved, nor is it indicative of future operating results or financial position.&#160;&#160;The pro forma adjustments are based upon currently available information and certain assumptions that we believe are reasonable under the circumstances.</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The following supplemental pro forma information presents the combined results of operations for the three and six months ended December 31, 2018 and 2019, as if Finisar had been acquired as of July 1, 2018.&#160;&#160;The supplemental pro forma information includes adjustments to amortization and depreciation for acquired intangible assets, property, plant and equipment, adjustments to share-based compensation expense, fair value adjustments on the inventories acquired, transaction costs, and interest expense and amortization of debt issuance costs related to the New Senior Credit Facilities as defined in Note 10.</p>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000395" name="us-gaap:BusinessAcquisitionProFormaInformationTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20190701_20191231" escape="true">

<p style="margin-top:18pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:1pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

</table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Contract Liabilities</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:6pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Payments received from customers are based on invoices or billing schedules as established in contracts with customers. Contract liabilities relate to billings in advance of performance under the contract. Contract liabilities are recognized as revenue when the performance obligation has been performed. During the three and six months ended December 31, 2019, the Company recognized revenue of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000512" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueRecognized" contextRef="C_0000820318_20191001_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">21.2</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000513" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueRecognized" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">50.2</ix:nonFraction> million, respectively, related to customer payments that were included as contract liabilities in the Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheet as of July 1, 2019. The Company had $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000514" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerLiability" contextRef="C_0000820318_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">37.7</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000515" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerLiability" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190630" decimals="-5" scale="6">19.4</ix:nonFraction> million of contract liabilities recorded in the Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheets as of December 31, 2019 and June 30, 2019, respectively.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000379" name="us-gaap:LesseeOperatingLeasesTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000379_dcnt_0bd11e93-0931-40b0-9256-d9f0a663e9f2">
<div style="align:left;">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:10.27%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note&#160;5</span><span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">.</span></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">Leases </p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:10.27%;text-indent:-10.27%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On July 1, 2019, the Company adopted Topic 842, Leases, using the&#160;modified retrospective transition approach. The reported results for the three and six months ended December 31, 2019 reflect the application of Topic 842, while prior period amounts have not been adjusted and continue to be reported in accordance with our historical accounting under Topic 840.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:7pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000517" name="us-gaap:RevenuePracticalExpedientInitialApplicationAndTransitionQualitativeAssessment" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231">The Company elected the practical expedient package permitted under the transition approach. As such, the Company did not reassess whether any expired or existing contracts are or contain leases, did not reassess historical lease classification, and did not reassess initial direct costs for any leases that existed prior to July 1, 2019.</ix:nonNumeric>  </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:7pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">As of the date of adoption, the Company recognized operating lease assets and liabilities of approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000518" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701" decimals="-5" scale="6"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000519" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLiability" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701" decimals="-5" scale="6">80.1</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> million on the Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheet. In addition, we acquired approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000520" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20191231" decimals="-6" scale="6">45</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000521" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLiability" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20191231" decimals="-6" scale="6">48</ix:nonFraction> million of operating lease assets and liabilities, respectively, through the acquisition of Finisar, which remains preliminary as discussed in Note 3.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">All existing leases that were classified as capital leases under Topic 840 are classified as finance leases under Topic 842. As of the date of adoption, the Company recognized finance lease assets of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000522" name="us-gaap:FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701" decimals="-6" scale="6">25</ix:nonFraction> million in property, plant and equipment, net, with corresponding finance lease liabilities of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000524" name="us-gaap:FinanceLeaseLiability" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701" decimals="-6" scale="6">24</ix:nonFraction> million on the Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheet.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">We determine if an arrangement is a lease at inception and classify it as either finance or operating.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Finance leases are generally those that allow us to substantially utilize or pay for the entire asset over its estimated useful life. Finance leases are recorded in property, plant and equipment, net, and finance lease liabilities within other current and other non-current liabilities on our Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheet. Finance lease assets are amortized in operating expenses on a straight-line basis over the shorter of the estimated useful lives of the assets or the lease term, with the interest component for lease liabilities included in interest expense and recognized using the effective interest method over the lease term.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Operating leases are recorded in other assets and operating lease liabilities, current and non-current on the Company&#8217;s Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheet. Operating lease assets are amortized on a straight-line basis in operating expenses over the lease term.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company&#8217;s lease liabilities are recognized based on the present value of the remaining fixed lease payments, over the lease term, using a discount rate of similarly secured borrowings available to the Company. For the purpose of lease liability measurement, we consider only payments that are fixed and determinable at the time of commencement. Any variable payments that depend on an index or rate are expensed as incurred. We account for non-lease components, such as common area maintenance, as a component of the lease, and include it in the initial measurement of our lease assets and corresponding liabilities. The Company&#8217;s lease terms and </p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">13</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:continuation id="F_000379_dcnt_0bd11e93-0931-40b0-9256-d9f0a663e9f2">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">conditions</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> may include options to extend</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> or terminate.</span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">An option is recognized </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">when it is reasonably certain that we will exercise that option. </span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company&#8217;s lease assets also include any lease payments made and exclude any lease incentives received prior to commencement. Our lease assets are tested for impairment in the same manner as long-lived assets used in operations. </p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000397" name="iivi:ScheduleOfLeaseCostsLeaseTermAndDiscountRatesTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The following table presents lease costs, which include short-term leases, lease term, and discount rates ($000):</p>

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:2%;">

<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company holds a <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000561" name="us-gaap:EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentage" contextRef="C_0000820318_20191231" decimals="3" scale="-2">93.8</ix:nonFraction>% equity investment in a privately-held company (&#8220;Equity Investment&#8221;), which it acquired for $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000562" name="us-gaap:EquityMethodInvestmentAggregateCost" contextRef="C_0000820318_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">51.7</ix:nonFraction> million. <td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#DAEEF3;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#DAEEF3;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:26.88%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000566" name="us-gaap:EquityMethodInvestments" contextRef="C_0000820318_srtStatementGeographicalAxis_countryUS_us-gaapInvestmentTypeAxis_us-gaapEquitySecuritiesMember_us-gaapRelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis_iiviNonconsolidatedInvestmentMember_20191231" decimals="-3" format="ixt:numdotdecimal" scale="3">57,658</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#DAEEF3;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
</tr>
</table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation>
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Equity Investment has been determined to be a variable interest entity because the Company has an overall <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000567" name="us-gaap:EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentage" contextRef="C_0000820318_20191231" decimals="3" scale="-2">93.8</ix:nonFraction>% economic position in the investee, comprising a significant portion of its capitalization, but has only a <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000568" name="us-gaap:VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentage" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" decimals="2" scale="-2">25</ix:nonFraction>% voting interest. The Company&#8217;s right to receive rewards and obligation to absorb expected losses is disproportionate to its voting interest. The Company is not the primary beneficiary because it does not have the power to direct the activities of the equity investment that most significantly impacts its economic performance. Certain business decisions, including decisions with respect to operating budgets, material capital expenditures, indebtedness, significant acquisitions or dispositions, and strategic decisions, require the approval of owners holding a majority percentage in the Equity Investment.&#160;&#160;The Company accounts for its interest as an equity method investment as the Company has the ability to exercise significant influence over operating and financial policies of the Equity Investment.</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">As of December 31, 2019 and June 30, 2019, the Company&#8217;s maximum financial statement exposure related to this Equity Investment was approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000569" name="us-gaap:EquityMethodInvestments" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapInvestmentTypeAxis_us-gaapEquitySecuritiesMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">57.7</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000570" name="us-gaap:EquityMethodInvestments" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapInvestmentTypeAxis_us-gaapEquitySecuritiesMember_20190630" decimals="-5" scale="6">57.6</ix:nonFraction> million, respectively, which is included in Investments on the Condensed Consolidated Balance Sheets.</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company has the right to purchase all of the outstanding interest of each of the minority equity holders, and the minority equity holders have the right to cause the Company to purchase all of their outstanding interests, at any time on or after the third anniversary of the investment, or earlier upon certain events. <span style="font-size:12pt;">&#160;</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000381" name="us-gaap:InventoryDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" escape="true">

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:3.33%;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Included in the table above is a building acquired under a finance lease. <p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The gross carrying amount and accumulated amortization of the Company&#8217;s intangible assets other than goodwill as of December 31, 2019 and June 30, 2019 were as follows ($000): </p>

<div>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin:auto;border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Other intangible assets primarily include $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000637" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">828.6</ix:nonFraction> million related to the preliminary purchase price allocation of Finisar. This includes preliminary amounts for technology of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000638" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_us-gaapFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis_us-gaapTechnologyBasedIntangibleAssetsMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">615.8</ix:nonFraction> million, customer lists of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000639" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_us-gaapFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis_us-gaapCustomerListsMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">125.4</ix:nonFraction> million, in process research and development of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000640" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_us-gaapFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis_us-gaapInProcessResearchAndDevelopmentMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">76.0</ix:nonFraction> million, and trade names of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000641" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredAndLiabilitiesAssumedIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill" contextRef="C_0000820318_us-gaapBusinessAcquisitionAxis_iiviFinisarCorporationMember_us-gaapFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis_us-gaapTradeNamesMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">11.4</ix:nonFraction> million. These items will be included in other intangible assets until the purchase price allocation is finalized.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">As a result of the July 1, 2019 segment realignment, the Company reviewed the recoverability of the carrying value of goodwill at its reporting units. The Company performed a quantitative test to determine whether it is more likely than not that the fair value of a reporting unit is less than its carrying amount, including goodwill and other intangible assets. The Company did <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000642" name="us-gaap:GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment" contextRef="C_0000820318_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction>t record any impairment of goodwill or long-lived assets, as the quantitative assessment did not indicate deterioration in the fair value of its reporting units. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">16</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
